summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog
Review Date: 2019/09/17
Store: JOYYUM
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '787414814279', 'Manufacturer': 'JOYYUM'}
Review Text: I have mixed feelings about this dryer.  It does a nice job over all but has some problems.  It takes a bit for it to heat up and would take forever to actually dry wet hair. It works well on lightly damp hair.  It has a button that spins the barrel different direction and it’s quite easy to use, but the motor to turn the barrel isn’t very strong and it take a bit to get going.  My biggest complaint is the sound.  It is very loud with a high pitched wail this is especially problematic because you use it right next to your ear.
Review Title: Very loud.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis Face Toner, 6.76 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2019/11/25
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.85 x 2.76 x 7.44 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '501000', 'Manufacturer': 'Embryolisse'}
Review Text: This is great toner. The scent is nice and it leaves my face feeling fresh and clean.
Review Title: Nice scent
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Title: Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels
Review Date: 2020/07/19
Store: Monikahair
Average Rating: 2.9
Product Details: {'UPC': '739515020639'}
Review Text: Wow! This foot peel is amazing. My feet are very calloused and dry and this works extremely well. I used this on a Wednesday and by Saturday my feet were starting to peel, by Sunday the were peeling a lot all over. Make sure you’re feet don’t need to be seen for a few days while they are in the peeling stage. It took 3 days for them to finish peeling, but now they look and feel so much better.
Review Title: Amazing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CIBBCCI Eyeshadow Makeup Palette 16 Colors Pigmented Velvet Texture Blendable Neutral Warm Long Lasting Eye Shadow Pallet With Mirror
Review Date: 2020/07/26
Store: CIBBCCI
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'CIBBCCI', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 4.9 x 0.6 inches; 0.73 Ounces', 'UPC': '718689217120'}
Review Text: This is a great pallet. The colors are highly pigmented so a little goes a long way. The powder feels light and smooth and is long lasting. The colors are so versatile and you can do many looks from day to evening, light and natural to dark and smokey. It also looks great on stage.
Review Title: Versatile
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===

Review Date: 2020/09/15

Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Material': 'Metal', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'minihope', 'Hair Type': 'Medium, Thick', 'Number of Pieces': '120', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 2.9 x 2.2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ET-SET-200703', 'UPC': '725683672763 661757097431'}
Review Text: These are great elastics.  They are sturdy and thick. They don’t snag or tangle on your hair and hold up for a long time. We go thrift them quick with 3 girls in the house so this pack is a great value for the money.
Review Title: Great value
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult)
Review Date: 2020/10/07
Store: Vedory
Product Description: ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.']
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'}
Review Text: Theses are lightweight and fairly comfortable and are great for teachers or sales clerks or anyone who needs to talk a lot for their job.  They can clip on to your mask, or can just sit inside of it.  They are very lightweight and hold the mask comfortably away from your face for easier talking.
Review Title: Great for talkers
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Facial Kit For Women - Includes Facial Mask, Facial Makeup Wipes, Nose Strips, Facial Cleansers, Facial- Self Care Package For Women (Multivitamin Facial Kit)

raw_response:
**Preferences & Patterns Summary:**

1. **Hair Care Products**: Frequent purchases of styling and maintenance tools, indicating a strong interest in hair grooming and management. Both stylers and accessories like hair ties and clips are popular.

2. **Skin Care & Beauty**: Regular acquisition of skincare products, including facial masks, moisturizers, and toners, suggests a commitment to skincare routines. Preference for moisture-rich formulations is evident.

3. **Functional Beauty Accessories**: Positive feedback on multifunctional items such as hair claws and makeup removers demonstrates a preference for convenience and utility in beauty tools.

4. **Scent Sensitivity & Enjoyment**: Several products noted positive scent experiences, showing a tendency towards fragrances that enhance user experience in both skincare and hair care.

5. **Product Ratings**: Mixed ratings across categories hint at discerning preferences; while some items receive high praise, others are critiqued for performance or functionality, indicating careful selection.

6. **Well-being Products**: Interest in products like foot masks and soaps with health benefits highlights a focus on self-care rituals and overall wellness.

Overall, the individual exhibits a holistic approach to beauty and personal care, valuing products that enhance aesthetic appeal, functionality, and self-care.
